```{r, eval = TRUE}
library(tidyverse)

readxl::read_excel(
  here::here(
    "data",
    "2020-21_School_Grades_Results.xlsx"
    )
  ) %>%
  slice_head(n = 2) -> midf

DT::datatable(midf, options = list(
      scroller = TRUE,
      deferRender = TRUE,
      scrollY = 400
      )
      )

```
